RACE.RACE_TEXT: Zia Derby Trial RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 1 400 Y Dirt CR: 93. Derby Trial Purse 8000. FOR THREE YEAR OLD REGISTERED NEW MEXICO BREDS THAT WERE NOMINATED AND REMAIN ELIGIBLE FOR THE 2023 ZIA QUARTER HORSE DERBY. Weight: 126 lbs. Late nominations of $15,000 (Includes All Fees) will be accepted at time of entry into the trials. The ten fast est times from the trials will qualify for the finals. There will be no Also Eligible List for the final.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JENAVI inched clear, best. KJ DADDYS MONEY chased, couldn't gain. DEANS DADDY in close, no rally. JUST EN KING veered out after start. MAXED OUT TO clear path, no rally. MY HEART JESS RUNS mid pack, evenly. GEMOLOGIST ducked out start. JHETT EYE crowded after start. LIL KINGS BIT reluctant to load, broke in.

ENTRY.NAME: Kj Daddys Money
ENTRY.OWNER: Lee John Lee Kathy and Mares I Ruben

ENTRY.NAME: Lil Kings Bit
ENTRY.OWNER: Robertson William R and Robertson Mary

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Zia Derby Trial RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 2 400 Y Dirt CR: 94. Derby Trial Purse 8000. FOR THREE YEAR OLD REGISTERED NEW MEXICO BREDS THAT WERE NOMINATED AND REMAIN ELIGIBLE FOR THE 2023 ZIA QUARTER HORSE DERBY. Weight: 126 lbs. Late nominations of $15,000 (Includes All Fees) will be accepted at time of entry into the trials. The ten fast est times from the trials will qualify for the finals. There will be no Also Eligible List for the final.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CODEX steady close, in time. MAJOR GAME vied throughout, gamely. KINGS TOUCH in close, not enough. WOOD DEE QUEEN steady bid. WHITE LIGHTENIN fractious gate, brushed start. SURFERS NIGHTMARE pushed out start. RC JESSA FLASHN broke in, brushed. VINTAGE BOURDEAUX came out start. DEMI LEIGH fractious gate. PRINCE SHASTA outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Major Game
ENTRY.OWNER: Perez Jamie Estrada Andres and Espinoza J Santos

ENTRY.NAME: Wood Dee Queen
ENTRY.OWNER: J & SM Inc Reynolds Don and Reynolds M Lane

ENTRY.NAME: Vintage Bourdeaux
ENTRY.OWNER: Gonzalez Marcelino and Porras Fabian Muniz

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Zia Derby Trial RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 3 400 Y Dirt CR: 81. Derby Trial Purse 8000. FOR THREE YEAR OLD REGISTERED NEW MEXICO BREDS THAT WERE NOMINATED AND REMAIN ELIGIBLE FOR THE 2023 ZIA QUARTER HORSE DERBY. Weight: 126 lbs. Late nominations of $15,000 (Includes All Fees) will be accepted at time of entry into the trials. The ten faste st times from the trials will qualify for the finals. There will be no Also Eligible List for the final.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WHITE KNIGHT lite bump start, drifted, held. TALBOTT drifted out early, drifted in late, steady bid. FANCYINALLOFUS in close, not enough. RICANELO no mishap. CARTEL COPY no mishap. EYE A ALLSTAR light bump start. A STREAKIN MAMBACITA off a step slowly. RC HEZA FLASHN DREAM no factor. NOLANS MOON took a bad step after start, rider lost balance.

ENTRY.NAME: Eye a Allstar
ENTRY.OWNER: Rich Haskell E and Rich Jacque M

ENTRY.NAME: Nolans Moon
ENTRY.COMMENT: took a bad step after start, rider lost balance

ENTRY.NAME: Talbott
ENTRY.COMMENT: drifted out early, drifted in late, steady bid

ENTRY.NAME: Ricanelo
ENTRY.OWNER: Bradley E Gene and Bradley Tod

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Zia Derby Trial RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 4 400 Y Dirt CR: 81. Derby Trial Purse 8000. FOR THREE YEAR OLD REGISTERED NEW MEXICO BREDS THAT WERE NOMINATED AND REMAIN ELIGIBLE FOR THE 2023 ZIA QUARTER HORSE DERBY. Weight: 126 lbs. Late nominations of $15,000 (Includes All Fees) will be accepted at time of entry into the trials. The ten fast est times from the trials will qualify for the finals. There will be no Also Eligible List for the final.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DASH FLASH inched clear, driving. REEF RIDGE in contention, hung late. TITLE WAVVE in close, not enough. RYLANDS RUNNER broke in. QUEEN OF TIDE came in start. CHICKS IN THE MEADOW came out start. SUN HARVEST mid pack, evenly. EAGLES FLASH broke in. NONOJESSEBADDOG broke in, outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Reef Ridge
ENTRY.OWNER: Bradley E Gene and Bradley Tod

ENTRY.NAME: Chicks in the Meadow
ENTRY.OWNER: Jungers Michelle King Marsha Farris Sandy and Pitcock Sharalyn

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Zia Derby Trial RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 5 400 Y Dirt CR: 91. Derby Trial Purse 8000. FOR THREE YEAR OLD REGISTERED NEW MEXICO BREDS THAT WERE NOMINATED AND REMAIN ELIGIBLE FOR THE 2023 ZIA QUARTER HORSE DERBY. Weight: 126 lbs. Late nominations of $15,000 (Includes All Fees) will be accepted at time of entry into the trials. The ten faste st times from the trials will qualify for the finals. There will be no Also Eligible List for the final.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PICK YOUR POUR clear early, handily. FINE AM EYE steady close, no match. EBW ONE DANCING FOOL clear path, steadily. FAST FLASHN no mishap. NINE WALKS broke in, bumped. DRINKING CHAMPANE mid pack, evenly. DOIN SOMETHING RIGHT brief speed. PENNER ASH broke out. A WARRIOR INSIDE broke out, bumped, bled, walked off. JESS A RESPONSE broke slowly, pinched back.

ENTRY.NAME: Pick Your Pour
ENTRY.OWNER: Granillo Orlando Mendoza Azucena and Mendoza Rene

ENTRY.NAME: A Warrior Inside
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, bumped, bled, walked off

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Zia Derby Trial RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 6 400 Y Dirt CR: 83. Derby Trial Purse 8000. FOR THREE YEAR OLD REGISTERED NEW MEXICO BREDS THAT WERE NOMINATED AND REMAIN ELIGIBLE FOR THE 2023 ZIA QUARTER HORSE DERBY. Weight: 126 lbs. Late nominations of $15,000 (Includes All Fees) will be accepted at time of entry into the trials. The ten fast est times from the trials will qualify for the finals. There will be no Also Eligible List for the final.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CRUZIN FOR CHICKZ set pace, all out. DOING SOMETHING GOOD steady bid, game effort. DEVONS CARTEL in close, no mishap. BAYLOR clear path, not enough. CQ FEATURED FIRST veered in start. ELISAS ESPERANCE even effort. THE DEVILS CARTEL no threat. BIG DADDY FOREVER broke in, off slow, crowded early. STYME lost rider start.

ENTRY.NAME: Devons Cartel
ENTRY.OWNER: Cavanaugh Fran Maze Judy Wells Nancy C and Wilson Renee K

ENTRY.NAME: Cruzin for Chickz
ENTRY.OWNER: Crenwelge Curtis Laird Jim and Espinosa Jose R

ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, off slow, crowded early

ENTRY.OWNER: Bolen Bradley C Clinger Cole M and Rodriguez Jose H

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 78. Claiming Purse 12700. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000. New Mexico Bred Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HUGHIE'S HOLIDAY moved up inside to set the pace, drew off on the turn and extended the lead under mild urging. JUVAL saved ground, got through along the inside on the turn and closed to get up late for place while no threat to the winner. CLUE veered in at the start to be away slowly, steadily advanced inside, bid, hung and was caught for second. BRUIN MAGIC led early, pressed the pace to the turn, fell back and finished evenly. RAFAEL'S SURPRISE showed speed to the turn, fell back and flattened out. SO CAL MEMORY raced in close, fell back on the turn, swung wide and gave way. MONEY LENDER raced outside, had brief speed only and was not a threat. JUST AWESOME M was outrun in an even effort. TENACIOUS LION raced mid pack in a wide trip and lacked a stretch response. SMOOTH BLUES was not a factor. RELEASE THE GENIE showed little.

ENTRY.NAME: Clue
ENTRY.OWNER: Centurion Racing Partners LLC and Cappellucci Dick
ENTRY.COMMENT: veered in start, off slowly, steady advance inside, caught for 2d

ENTRY.NAME: Hughie's Holiday
ENTRY.COMMENT: moved up inside, drew off turn, extended lead, mild urging

ENTRY.NAME: Rafael's Surprise
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to turn, fell back, flattened out,

ENTRY.NAME: So Cal Memory
ENTRY.COMMENT: in close, fell back turn, swung wide, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Juval
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, got through inside turn, closed, up for place

ENTRY.NAME: Bruin Magic
ENTRY.COMMENT: led early, pressed to turn, fell back, finished evenly

ENTRY.NAME: Tenacious Lion
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, wide trip, lacked a stretch response

ENTRY.NAME: Money Lender
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced outside, brief speed only, no threat,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 8 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 79. Claiming Purse 15700. FOR REGISTERED NEW MEXICO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: REINING PESOS pressed the pace along the inside, got through on the turn, challenged for the lead, dueled through the stretch and proved best. LEAD MONTEREY set a pressured pace, responded when challenged to duel through the stretch and was outfinished in a long drive. GOLD BOUNDRY pressed the pace towards the outside, challenged three across on the turn, swung out, dropped back and settled for show. DECK HUMOR was taken off the rail early, angled back in, bid along the inside and had little left for the drive. DIABOLICAL MIGHT broke out, pressed the pace, bid between horses on the turn, dropped back and gave way. SOUTHWESTERN HOPE raced mid pack, swung wide entering the stretch, bid and came up empty. QUIEN ES improved position in an even effort. THE GREAT DOME raced close to the pace, bid off the rail and had nothing left for the drive. MR. SILVER EXPRESS raced close to the pace towards the outside, swung wide leaving the turn and stopped. FULL OF DRIVE hesitated at the start to be off slowly and trailed the field.

ENTRY.NAME: Deck Humor
ENTRY.COMMENT: taken off rail, angled back in, bid inside, little left

ENTRY.NAME: Reining Pesos
ENTRY.OWNER: Segovia Jaime Armendariz Jose and Gonzalez Karina
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed inside, got through turn, dueled stretch, proved best

ENTRY.NAME: Lead Monterey
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, responded to duel, outfinished, long drive,

ENTRY.NAME: Diabolical Might
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, pressed pace, bid between horses turn, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: The Great Dome
ENTRY.COMMENT: close to pace, bid off rail, nothing left for drive

ENTRY.NAME: Southwestern Hope
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, swung wide into stretch, bid, came up empty

ENTRY.NAME: Gold Boundry
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed outside, challenged 3across turn, swung out, fell back

ENTRY.NAME: Mr. Silver Express
ENTRY.COMMENT: in close outside, swung wide leaving turn, stopped,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 9 6F Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 13200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHE HIT A HOMER pressed the pace along the inside, challenged for the lead into the turn, drew clear entering the stretch, was shortening strides and just lasted. GRAN MANNA raced close to the pace, swung wide leaving the turn, found her best stride late and was gaining ground. FI FI D'ORO saved ground while racing close to the pace, closed willingly, was gaining late and got up for show. WAY RITE led early, responded when challenged to duel, swung wide leaving the turn and closed steadily. LITTLE SAMURAI was void of early speed, went widest in the drive and offered a mild bid only. SHAKE RAG was never far back, raced outside, lacked a bid and failed to threaten. ALLERGIC TO LOGIC pressed the pace, fell back into the turn and leveled off. BINALLOVERDRINKEN broke in the air to be off slowly, was restrained early and not urged late.

ENTRY.NAME: Fi Fi d'Oro
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, closed willingly, gaining late, up for show

ENTRY.NAME: Little Samurai
ENTRY.COMMENT: void early speed, widest in drive, mild bid

ENTRY.NAME: Binalloverdrinken
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in air, off slowly, restrained early, not urged late

ENTRY.NAME: Gran Manna
ENTRY.OWNER: Centurion Racing Partners LLC and Cappellucci Dick
ENTRY.COMMENT: close to pace, swung wide into stretch, best stride late, gaining

ENTRY.NAME: She Hit a Homer
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed inside, challenged turn, drew clear, just lasted,

ENTRY.NAME: Way Rite
ENTRY.COMMENT: led early, responded to duel, swung wide turn, steady close

ENTRY.NAME: Shake Rag
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, raced outside, lacked a bid, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Allergic to Logic
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, fell back into turn, leveled off

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 10 6F Dirt CR: 79. Claiming Purse 13200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE DECEMBER 1. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000. New Mexico Bred Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MASK OFF set a pressured pace, responded when challenged to duel and drew off under left handed urging. PATRIOT pressed the pace while racing along the rail, challenged for the lead on the turn, dueled to late stretch, was no match late and finished second best. SILVER DADDY was void of early speed, dropped inside to save ground, bid off the rail and closed well to earn show. SOUTHERN SUMMER lagged early, bid four wide and improved position. JAZZ MAN DO raced mid pack in a wide trip and failed to menace in an even effort. FINGLAS LAD pressed the pace between horses, fell back on the turn and gave way. JERSEY JOE was void of early speed, raced wide and passed tiring rivals. COWBOY TOBY led early, pressed the pace five across, dropped back on the turn and gave way. GOLDEN BAND was never far back, was through early and steadily faded from contention. COLOR ME GONE was not a factor. WHEREDOESTHECASHGO pressed the pace while racing between horses to the turn and gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Patriot
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed rail, challenged turn, dueled, no match late

ENTRY.NAME: Mask Off
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, responded to duel, drew off, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Finglas Lad
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed between horses, fell back turn, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Wheredoesthecashgo
ENTRY.OWNER: Carnes Tony P and Cappellucci Dick
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace between horses, gave way turn,

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Band
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, through early, steady fade

ENTRY.NAME: Silver Daddy
ENTRY.OWNER: Atkinson Thoroughbreds LLC and Hudson Jeff D
ENTRY.COMMENT: void early speed, saved ground, bid off rail, closed well,

ENTRY.NAME: Cowboy Toby
ENTRY.COMMENT: led early, pressed 5wide, fell back, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Jersey Joe
ENTRY.COMMENT: void early speed, raced wide, passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Jazz Man Do
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, wide trip, even effort

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 11 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 72. Allowance Purse 37000. FOR REGISTERED NEW MEXICO BRED FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 121 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MOONLIGHT WARRIOR stalked the pace, rallied on the turn, assumed command and drew off in the drive. ARE YOU LISTENING set the pace to the turn, fell back, went evenly late and finished second best. HOLOTTALUTE was unhurried early, swung wide leaving the turn and offered a mild bid to earn show. SHAME ON CHARLOTTE raced mid pack in an even effort and failed to threaten. ABSTRACT LILLY dropped inside to save ground, lacked a bid and was outrun. LEONAS GIRL held a good position, lacked a stretch response and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Are You Listening
ENTRY.OWNER: Gray Wesley T and Gray Glenda
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace to turn, fell back, evenly late, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Leonas Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position, no stretch response, stopped,

ENTRY.NAME: Abstract Lilly
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped inside, saved ground, lacked a bid, outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Holottalute
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, swung wide leaving turn, mild bid, up for show

ENTRY.NAME: Moonlight Warrior
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, rallied turn, took command, drew off in drive

ENTRY.NAME: Shame On Charlotte
ENTRY.OWNER: Bell Ronnie L and Bell L Kent
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, even effort, failed to threaten
